title: How is ap nunu balanced?
body: Just tell me how a targeted nuke on a 2 sec cooldown that has a slow that 3 sec is balance

replies.body: Correct, the 39% win rate Nunu build is OP.
I never lost with it

You will win if you're against a team without teamwork, which is what most teams under gold will be like. The only thing to do with him is splitpush and hope they come at you one or two at a time. AP nunu blows up and dies if he can't eat a minion, so he is only strong in the lanes where enemy minions are...if he gets alone in the jungle or in lane without minions he's basically dead to any competent team. If they group and force teamfights without you or even with you, unless their teamfight is way worse than yours, they will win, because full ap nunu isn't great in teamfights (only the ult, and even then you can't really stay close because you will die). There is a reason he is usually build almost full tank, and that is because he slows and is annoying, forcing them to focus him, and yet he survives if he is tanky. If he's ap, he gets blown up (once again unless he can eat a minion, which he can't do if he gets stunned while ulting).

I've done it before, and yes it is super fun and "op" but only if the enemy comes at you one at a time like i said.


 And you have never played with it either ;) looking at your match history you don't have any games as nunu...
Do you think anyone will actually take this seriously?
Well I will getting my freelo if that what you think

>
> Well I will getting my freelo if that what you think

Gl getting any elo with nunu

Eh, I've seen plenty of AP nunus stomp bronze through low silver because they bully lane hard and then have excellent zone control against the (usually uncoordinated and CC-less) teams they face.

It's still a cheese strat tho.
Because Nunu is awful.
